CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Reply1__c , "いいえ"), ISPICKVAL(Reply2__c , "いいえ"), ISPICKVAL(Reply3__c , "いいえ"), ISPICKVAL(Reply4__c , "いいえ"), ISPICKVAL(Reply5__c , "いいえ"), ISPICKVAL(Reply6__c , "いいえ"), ISPICKVAL(Reply7__c , "いいえ"), ISPICKVAL(Reply8__c , "いいえ"), ISPICKVAL(Reply9__c , "いいえ"), ISPICKVAL(Reply10__c , "いいえ"), ISPICKVAL(Reply1__c , "確認中"), ISPICKVAL(Reply2__c , "確認中"), ISPICKVAL(Reply3__c , "確認中"), ISPICKVAL(Reply4__c , "確認中"), ISPICKVAL(Reply5__c , "確認中"), ISPICKVAL(Reply6__c , "確認中"), ISPICKVAL(Reply7__c , "確認中"), ISPICKVAL(Reply8__c , "確認中"), ISPICKVAL(Reply9__c , "確認中"), ISPICKVAL(Reply10__c , "確認中") ), "確認事項有り", "OK" )
CustomField.label: 回答結果
